 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרַס‎</span>] **verb** ==bend down, stoop, crouch== (intransitive) (compare perhaps Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***disc, round cake***; compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְסוֺל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְצוֺל‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְסוּלָּא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְצוּלָא‎</span> all ***ankle***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽרְסוּ‎</span> [[Isa.46.2|Isa 46:2]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹרֵס‎</span> v[[Isa.46.1|Isa 46:1]] (both + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרַע‎</span>); of vanquished gods of Babylon.
